subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Mini Box on the Paranormal State site.
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1804125084-1202161895=:30885
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Congrats Frank!!!  I know we are not suppose to have favorite boxes, but in my honest  opinion it's not the Mini Box (sorry Ron no disrespect intended just my preference). 
   
  It's kinda funny though, the 2 boxes I like the most I don't own, but at lease have the privilege of doing sessions over skype with their owners.  (I try and not let anything stop my motivation with communication from the other-side).  Regardless of who possess a Franks Box, Joe's Box or Super Radio we are still able to get the best experiences by good people in this group who own them.  They allow us the opportunity to partake in sessions and sharing the clips!  
   
  So guys, thanks for some great experiences!!!
   
  Juli

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Frank S.,
 
Well, you hit the big time pal!
 
I don't know if I like that the minibox got top billing.
 
Bruce


  Bruce Halliday
